ode::ODECollisionInterface Class Reference
[Physics simulation support library (ODE C++ wrapper)]

#include <ODECollisionInterface.h>

Inheritance diagram for ode::ODECollisionInterface:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

Called by simulator to get contacts between objects.

Application checks collisions and returns number of contacts.


Public Member Functions

virtual int checkCollisions (dGeomID o1, dGeomID o2, dContact *contacts, int maxcontacts)=0
 Called when two objects are near.

Member Function Documentation

virtual int ode::ODECollisionInterface::checkCollisions (  dGeomID  o1,
dGeomID  o2,
dContact *  contacts,
int  maxcontacts
)  [pure virtual]
 

Called when two objects are near.

Parameters:
o1 The first object geometry.
o2 The second object geometry.
contacts Contact buffer.
maxcontacts Maximum number of contacts in the buffer.
Returns:
Number of contacts in the buffer to add as contact joints to the simulation solver.

Implemented in ode::ODEDefaultCollisionChecker.
